name: Doom Metal
description: Plodding tempos, repeated chords, and thick, distorted, down-tuned guitars in a style focused on foreboding, atmosphere, and tension.

children.name: Death Doom Metal
children.description: Fuses down-tuned guitars, growled vocals, and aggressive, often double-kick drumming with a mournful, somber atmosphere and plodding tempos.

children.name: Death Doom Metal
children.description: Fuses down-tuned guitars, growled vocals, and aggressive, often double-kick drumming with a mournful, somber atmosphere and plodding tempos.

children.name: Funeral Doom Metal
children.description: Features exceptionally slow, funeral dirge-like tempos; crushing, sluggish guitars; mournful, melancholic atmosphere; and distant, hushed growls and grunts.

children.name: Funeral Doom Metal
children.description: Features exceptionally slow, funeral dirge-like tempos; crushing, sluggish guitars; mournful, melancholic atmosphere; and distant, hushed growls and grunts.

children.name: Traditional Doom Metal
children.description: Monotonous and heavy playing style; repetitive, rough, and sometimes atonal guitar riffs; a "rocking to sleep" bass; and influences from both Blues Rock and Psychedelic Rock.

children.name: Traditional Doom Metal
children.description: Monotonous and heavy playing style; repetitive, rough, and sometimes atonal guitar riffs; a "rocking to sleep" bass; and influences from both Blues Rock and Psychedelic Rock.
